message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM. 

The paper deals with cross-lingual document alignment, which is a task related to natural language processing (NLP) and information retrieval (IR). Therefore, cs.CL and cs.IR are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes an unsupervised scoring function that leverages cross-lingual sentence embeddings to compute the semantic distance between documents, which involves machine learning techniques and could fall under cs.LG and cs.AI. Finally, the paper deals with massively multilingual document alignment, which could be related to cs.MM.
